page.title: 06THE SCHOOL
page.content:
{ }The only primary{school}within the designated area is at Constable Burton.Older children travel to Leyburn to the secondary school.The school at Constable Burton is built of stone.It has a bell tower but the bell is no longer used.
There are 2 classrooms.One is bigger than the other,and they are joined by an archway.The juniors use the larger room.The school is now heated by electricity,although there used to be a coal stove.
At the side there is a playground which is covered in tarmac and marked out for hockey.At the top of the playground is a small lawn where the children play in summer.
